mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MEMBER (ID, PW, NAME, NICKNAME, BIRTHDATE, GENDER) VALUES (#{ID}, #{PW}, #{NAME}, #{NICKNAME}, #{BIRTHDATE}, #{GENDER});
mapper.select: SELECT A.LOG_NUM, A.ID, A.M_TITLE, A.M_ARTIST, A.P_NUM, B.P_BRAND, B.P_MODEL, B.P_INFO FROM T_LOG A, T_PERFUME B WHERE A.ID=#{ID} AND A.P_NUM=B.P_NUM
SELECT * FROM T_PERFUME ORDER BY P_CNT DESC LIMIT 3;
